carts.name: Gildan Adult Heavy Cotton Long Sleeve T-Shirt, Style G5400, 2-Pack
carts.description: Solids: 100% Cotton; Sport Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; Graphite Heather: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester Imported Pull On closure Machine Wash Classic fit for loose comfort Versatile mid-weight fabric for year-round wear Rib cuffs Non-topstitched, classic width, rib collar Tear away label for customizable comfort Screen printing, embroidery, DTG, iron-on transfers, bleaching and tie dye

carts.name: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Classic Amanda High Rise Tapered Jean
carts.description: 98% Cotton, 2% Elastane Imported Zipper closure Machine Wash STYLE - high rise jean sits at natural waist with functional pockets, easy zipper fly, belt loops and slight taper leg for the fit you love VERSATILITY - Goes great with all tops from fashionable to basic a T-shirts and all footwear from stylish boots to your favorit shoes.LENGTH - This pant comes in a 31 inch regular/average inseam, 29 inch short inseam and 33 inch long inseam with a 15 inch leg opening.BRAND - Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.

carts.name: Prime for Face Makeup Primer by Mirabella Beauty - Weightless Face Primer Preps, Primes, Perfects & Protects
carts.description: Weightless Primer: Mirabellas Prime for Face Makeup Primer is the long-lasting layer you hve been looking for. It smooths skin and moisturizes for a sleek, clean look. Create a flawless canvas for any makeup look with this perfecting primer.Designed to Moisturize: This silicone-based formula contains Vitamin E. The moisturizing effect smooths fine lines and protects your skin from dryness.All Day Perfection: All skin types are compatible with this smooth primer, and oily skin will adore the barrier it creates to prevent breakthrough shine.

carts.name: Nike Men's Sportswear Club Pullover Hoodie
carts.description: FLEECE LINED: Crafted with soft fleece fabric, the Nike sweatshirt features an updated, slim hem and cuffs for a clean look. The fleece fabric is brushed on the back for softness.

carts.name: Under Armour Women's Tech Short Sleeve V-neck - Twist
carts.description: UA Tech fabric is quick-drying, ultra-soft & has a more natural feel

carts.name: Premium Luxury Gold Women Facial Skin Care Set (4Pcs) Beauty & Personal Care, Nourishing And Moisturizing, Calming Korea Cosmetic for Yedam Yun Bit
carts.description: Prime Luxury Gold Intensive Emulsion: Both phyto placenta and royal jelly extracts provide abundant nutritions to dried skin and relaxed and smooth feeling to form moisturized membrane on the skin so as to make you feel moisturized, refined and soft skin.

carts.name: Fruit of the Loom Women's Front Closure Cotton Bra
carts.description: The Fruit of the Loom women's comfort front close sport bra is one of our best sellers. The soft cotton fabric is light and breathable and the front close design insures stay in place straps an active lifestyle requires a brand that can give support and comfort.

carts.name: Sergio Tacchini By Sergio Tacchini For Men. Eau De Toilette Spray 1.7 Ounces
carts.description: Introduced in 1996. Fragrance notes: fresh notes of lavender and citrus fruits with sweet spices and wood. Recommended use: daytime.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.
